1887 Detroit Champions of the League.  Imperial Cabinet.  8" x 9 1/2". Edge trimming, otherwise nice.  Framed.  Sold.

1870's tintype.  2 1/2" x 3 1/2" (6th plate). Sold.

Civil War stereoview of soldiers with baseball equipment.  $250.
